    Naveen Marri

    Graduate student at Indiana University Bloomington, part of CREST (Center for Research in Extreme Scale Technologies) lab working on machine learning for resource constrained devices

    talks

    Tutorial 1 on Relevant Topic in Your Field

    Published: March 01, 2013

    More information here

    Data Science and Bigdata

    Published: October 03, 2015

    Gave idea on how bigdata and data science are interlinked. Presented few usecases on anomaly detection, association rule mining, customer segmentation using clustering techniques. Presented some of the benchmarks we’ve got when implementing the algorithms on SAP HANA and Apache Spark.

    Talk on Approximation algorithms,recommender systems in Apache spark

    Published: September 20, 2016

    Gave talk at SAP TechED, Introduced the concept of recommender systems and various techniques like collaborative and content based filtering techniques that can be employed for recommender systems.
